name: Mark the Words
description: Identify and click on specific words in text. Perfect for word type identification, term recognition, and grammar exercises.

ai_input_format.description: AI should generate an object with a title, instruction, and an array of exercises with text containing *markable* word markers.

schema.title: string - Exercise title
schema.instruction: string - What words to mark (e.g., 'Click on all the verbs')

exercises.text: string - Text with *markable* words indicated by asterisks
exercises.markables: array of strings - The words that should be marked (for reference)
exercises.wordType: string - Optional category of marked words (e.g., 'verbs', 'nouns', 'adjectives')

example.title: Identify the Verbs
example.instruction: Click on all the verbs in the following sentences.

exercises.text: The scientist *observes* the experiment and carefully *records* the results in her notebook.
Plants *absorb* sunlight through their leaves and *convert* it into chemical energy.
The students *analyzed* the data and *presented* their findings to the class.

h5p_params_format.taskDescription: Click on all the verbs in the following sentences.
h5p_params_format.textField:
